snippet: Apple’s newly designed laptop looks good, starts up quickly and has a Retina display screen. And yes, it is expensive.
abstract: David Pogue State of the Art column lauds Apple’s newly designed laptop MacBook Pro, pointing out it looks good, starts up quickly and has a Retina display screen; notes it is expensive, with the base model listed at $2,200 and other models priced to $3,750.
lead_paragraph: Apple’s newly designed laptop looks good, starts up quickly and has a Retina display screen. And yes, it is expensive.

headline.print_headline: MacBook, A Point Shy Of Perfect
headline.seo: Apple’s MacBook Pro Is Just One Point Short of Perfection - State of the Art
headline.main: MacBook, a Point Shy of Perfect
